name: Wyrm Quest
description:
A simple action RPG where you level up by killing monsters. You can also level up equipment for more stat bonuses. 

Project is still in it's infancy and more features will come at a later date, along with an actual art style. If you have any feedback, please comment here or give your feedback in the discord!

Thank you for playing~

Follow Development:

  

Be a part of the community!

Join us in the Blast Programming Discord Server!
